attributes.action:
Prime Minister May,
please end austerity....it isn't working!
attributes.background:
The bedroom tax isn't working....just causing hardship for families and the ill/disabled.
The WCA and PIP isn't working....people are dying or their health conditions exacerbated.
Sanctions are not working...healthy unemployed people are dying or made ill.
These policies have not worked..End them

rejection.details: You could start a petition calling on the Government to change specific policies, but it's not clear what you mean by "end austerity".
